'''1.5.1 Build 5''' is the fifth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released in April 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* New Forge build (659).
* Fixes the Java 7 update 21 launch problem.
